mapper.select: select a.COURSEID,a.LECTUREID,a.NAME,a.STATUS,a.TOTALCLASS,a.PRICE,a.TYPE, a.SOLD,a.PASS,a.LASTCLASSTIME,a.REVIEWERID,x.USERNAME from XTEL_COURSEINFO a inner join XTEL_USERINFOTABLE x on a.LECTUREID=x.USERID
mapper.update: update XTEL_COURSEINFO set STATUS=2 where COURSEID=#{teachingID}
mapper.select: select a.COURSEID,a.LECTUREID,a.NAME,a.TOTALCLASS,a.PRICE,a.TYPE, a.SOLD,a.PASS,a.LASTCLASSTIME,a.REVIEWERID,c.ID,c.TIME,c.STATUS,B.USERNAME from XTEL_CourseArrangement c left join XTEL_COURSEINFO a on c.COURSEID=a.COURSEID inner join XTEL_UserInfoTable b on a.LECTUREID=b.USERID where c.STATUS=0
mapper.update: update XTEL_CourseArrangement set STATUS=1 where ID=#{id}
